body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, my name is Sarah Williams and I am a customer service agent at XYZ Car Dealership. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Kathleen. Can you provide me with your phone number so we can assist you further?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my number is five five five, six seven eight, nine zero one two.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Kathleen. One more thing, could you confirm your address for our records?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my address is one two three Main Street, Cityville, State 0 zero zero 1 two.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information. Is there anything else you would like to share with us today, Kathleen?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling frustrated with the service I received at your dealership.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that, Kathleen. Your feedback is important to us. We will look into this matter further. Thank you for bringing it to our attention.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Kathleen. Have a great day.
